law.catch_line: Display By Insurer Offering Tiered Network Plan Of Cost Sharing Differences For Enrollees In Various Tiers In Promotional And Agreement Material
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 61, Sec. 2 effective May 1, 2012. See 2012, 61, Sec. 5.] An insurer offering a tiered network plan shall clearly and conspicuously indicate, in all promotional and agreement materials, the cost-sharing differences for enrollees in the various tiers. The commissioner shall adopt regulations to carry out this section.
